name: Oracle Queen, Himiko
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 5], put a [Critical] or [Draw] trigger from your soul on the bottom of your deck, and that trigger effect activates once for each grade of your opponent's vanguard.

name: Interdimensional Dragon, Mystery-flare Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, activate all of the effects below according to the sum of the grades of the face up cards in your bind zone.
・3 or more - This unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.
・7 or more - This unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
・13 or more - Choose six of your units, and they get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
・19 or more - At the end of this turn, [COST][discard all of the cards from your hand], and you get an additional turn. You cannot ride during that turn.

name: School Hunter, Leo-pald
effect:
[CONT](VC):If you have a grade 3 in your soul, this unit's [AUTO] abilities activate two times. ('When placed' abilities will also activate two times)
[AUTO](VC):When placed, put the top card of your deck into your drop zone, and perform one of the effects below depending on that card's type.
・Normal Unit - Look at four cards from the top of your deck, call up to two grade 2 or less cards from among them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
・Trigger Unit - This unit gets [Power] +15000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Battle Deity of the Night, Artemis
effect:
[CONT](VC):All of your units with divine gauge cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects, get [Power] +5000, and the trigger effects that this unit gets.
[AUTO](RC):When placed, you may put a card from your soul face down as a divine gauge for this unit.

name: Battle Maiden, Sahohime
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 2], draw two cards, put a card from your hand into your soul, and increase this unit's [Power] by the [Shield] of the card put into your soul until end of turn.

name: Interdimensional Dragon, Idealize Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, activate all of the effects below according to the sum of the grades of the face up cards in your bind zone.
・1 or more - Your opponent chooses one of his or her rear-guards, and puts it on the bottom of the deck.
・5 or more - Call the top card of your deck to (RC).
・11 or more - Call two cards from your drop zone to (RC), and three of your rear-guards get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Interdimensional Dragonknight, Lost Legend
effect:
[ACT](VC):[COST][Discard cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand], search your deck for a grade 4 card, ride it as [Stand], shuffle your deck, and at the end of this turn, retire that unit, and ride a grade 3 card from your soul as [Rest].
[AUTO]:When rode upon, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and draw a card.

name: Pencil Hero, Hammsuke
effect: [AUTO](VC):When placed, if you have "Pencil Knight, Hammsuke" and "Pencil Squire, Hammsuke" in your soul, [COST][discard two cards from your hand], you get an Imaginary Gift: Accel, search your deck for up to one "Pencil Knight, Hammsuke" and "Pencil Squire, Hammsuke", call them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Binoculus Tiger
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], put the top card of your deck into your drop zone, and perform one of the effects below depending on that card's type.
・Normal Unit - Draw a card.
・Trigger Unit - Choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and three of the units in your front row get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Eternal Goddess, Iwanagahime
effect: [ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 3], draw a card, put a card from your hand into your soul, and increase this unit's [Power] by two times of the [Shield] of the card put into your soul until end of turn.

name: Battle Maiden, Shitateruhime
effect: [ACT](VC/RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1], until end of turn, reduce the next time you [Soul-Blast] by ②, and one of your other units gets [Power] +3000.

name: Goddess of Self-sacrifice, Kushinada
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Lost Break Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, [COST][bind a card from your hand], and draw a card.
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your bind zone has a face up card, this unit gets [Power] +3000.

name: Steam Guard, Kastilia
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Armed Instructor, Bison
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and one of your other rear-guards gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If this unit is on your (VC), [Stand] that rear-guard.

name: Monoculus Tiger
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks or boosts a rear-guard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], put the top card of your deck into your drop zone, and perform one of the effects below depending on that card's type.
・Normal Unit - Your opponent cannot call sentinels from his or her hand until end of that battle.
・Trigger Unit - Your opponent can only call trigger units from his or her hand until end of that battle.

name: Cable Sheep
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Battle Maiden, Izunahime
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed, [Soul-Blast 1].
[CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Twilight Hunter, Artemis
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When its attack hits, you may put a card from your soul face down as a divine gauge for this unit.
[CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +10000 for each of this unit's divine gauge.

name: Bowstring of Heaven and Earth, Artemis
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks or boosts, you may put a card from your soul face down as a divine gauge for this unit.
[ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Discard one of this unit's divine gauge], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and retire it.

name: Witch of Cats, Cumin
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Rest] this unit], and return one of your [Stand] rear-guards to your hand, or put a card from your drop zone into your soul.

name: Administrator of Hope, Pandora
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Escrude Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], bind one of your other rear-guards, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards with grade less than that card, and put it on the bottom of the deck. If it was put on the bottom of the deck, you draw a card.

name: Steam Mechanic, Nabu
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][bind a card from your drop zone], and your opponent cannot call grade 1 or greater cards from his or her hand until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, put this unit into your soul, and draw a card.

name: Wedgemove Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When its attack hits, [COST][bind a card from your hand], and draw a card.
[CONT](Hand):When this card would be discarded, it may be discarded as a grade 3.

name: Steam Artist, Abi-ratta
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Geograph Giant
effect: [CONT](RC):If it is on an additional (RC), this unit gets [Power] +8000.

name: Pencil Knight, Hammsuke
effect:
[CONT](RC):If your vanguard is "Pencil Hero, Hammsuke", this unit gets [Power] +3000.
[CONT](VC):During the battle that it attacked, if "Pencil Squire, Hammsuke" is in your soul, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Pencil Squire, Hammsuke
effect:
[CONT](RC):If your vanguard is "Pencil Hero, Hammsuke", this unit gets [Power] +4000.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], search your deck for up to one "Pencil Knight, Hammsuke", reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Speculate Chipmunk
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Tank Mouse
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your card is put into the drop zone from your deck, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and return that card to your hand. (Only one card can be returned even if multiple cards are put)

name: Goddess of the Milky Way, Pleione
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, look at three cards from the top of your deck, put one card from among them into your soul, and put two cards from among them on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Strong Bow of the Starry Night, Ulixes
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle that it attacked a vanguard, [COST][put this unit into your soul], draw a card, and [Soul-Charge 1].

name: Battle Maiden, Mihikarihime
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, reduce the next time you [Soul-Blast] by ③ until end of turn.

name: Swift Runner of the Clear Skies, Achilles
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Put this unit into your soul], and three of your units get [Power] +3000 until end of turn.

name: Witch of Frogs, Melissa
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast 3], your opponent looks at the same number of cards from the top of his or her deck as the number of his or her rear-guards, calls them to (RC) with units, and shuffles the deck. Your opponent's abilities do not activate from this call.

name: Aiming for the Stars, Artemis
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.

name: Witch of Big Pots, Laurier
effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)

name: Steam Expert, Zerix
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC):When your vanguard is placed, one of your vanguards and this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Steam Hunter, Lippitt
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, [COST][bind a card from your drop zone], and this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.

name: Gun-bezel Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each grade of your vanguard, and at the end of that battle, bind this unit. (+20000 if grade 4)

name: Steam Fighter, Ahne
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Bind a card from your hand], choose a rear-guard in your opponent's front row, and put it on the bottom of the deck. Call a "Steam Expert, Zerix" from your drop zone to (RC). If "Steam Fighter, Memenne" is on your (RC), you may ride it as [Stand] instead of calling it.

name: Steam Scara, Kalain
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it boosts, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], until end of that battle, your opponent cannot intercept, and can only call up to three guardians. At the end of that battle, bind this unit.

name: Quicky Quicky Worker
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, put up to one card from your drop zone on the bottom of your deck. If you put a grade 3 or greater card, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and draw a card.

name: Steam Fighter, Memenne
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your vanguard is placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand. If you discarded a grade 3 or greater card, three of your units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Primordial Dracokid
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.

effect: [ACT](VC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1] grade 3], and until end of turn, all of the units in your front row get [Power] +10000, and your opponent cannot intercept.

name: Toolbox Wallaby
effect: [AUTO]:When it intercepts, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Barcode Zebra
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your card is put from your deck into the drop zone, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

effect: [AUTO](RC):When its attack hits a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.

effect: [CONT](RC):If it is in the back row, this unit gets [Power] +4000.
